name: Pet-Xiety
description:
Welcome to Pet-Xiety, the game that incorporates dogs with breathing technique and exercises. Please note, whilst on the web version that videos will load on 'YouTube' in a new tab.

How to play: Walk around the environment by following your own path. Interact with the dogs and videos around the scene, the different fire colours have different video exercises.   Use the mouse to rotate the camera.  W - to move forward.  A/D - to move sideways.   S - to walk backwards.  E- Interact with the videos*. 1 - Interact with the dogs**. Escape - Load up pause menu.  2 - Hide the cursor.  For the best experience, it is recommended to use headphones.  *Videos will load in a new tab.  **Be next to the dogs to interact with them, if interaction does not work then move closer.
